attributes.action: Change the laws whereby Disabled badge holders can park anywhere they see fit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regularly I look outside of work to find disabled badge holders are parked in the loading bay, causing traffic chaos as lorries have to double park etc. The police/CSO's come and ticket the people without a badge but can't do anything about disabled badge holders. Why should they be allowed to park where others can and cause chaos?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
